events.name: New Year's Eve Party at The Waterfront
events.description: Ring in 2025 with live DJs, champagne on arrival, and stunning riverside views. Dress code: Smart casual.

events.name: Norwich Market New Year's Day Trading
events.description: Start the new year browsing Norwich's famous open-air market. Fresh produce, local crafts, and hot food stalls.

events.name: Live Music: The Vagaband
events.description: Celtic fusion band blending traditional Irish music with contemporary sounds. An energetic night of music and dancing.

events.name: Pantomime: Cinderella
events.description: Classic pantomime fun for all the family. Watch as Cinderella finds her prince in this magical production.

events.name: Norwich City FC vs Leeds United
events.description: The Canaries take on Leeds United in this crucial Championship fixture. Come support the yellows and greens!

events.name: Saturday Night Fever Tribute Night
events.description: Disco fever returns! Dance the night away to classic 70s hits. Dress up in your best disco outfit.

events.name: Free Community Yoga in Chapelfield Gardens
events.description: Start your Sunday with outdoor yoga suitable for all levels. Bring your own mat. Weather permitting.

events.name: Antiques & Collectables Fair
events.description: Browse vintage treasures, antique furniture, and collectables from expert dealers. Entry includes tea/coffee.

events.name: Stand-Up Comedy Night
events.description: Laugh out loud with four top comedians. Intimate venue, great atmosphere. 18+ only.

events.name: Indie Night at The Birdcage
events.description: Alternative music night featuring the best indie, rock, and new wave tracks. DJ spinning vinyl all night.

events.name: Norwich Farmers Market
events.description: Monthly farmers market with fresh local produce, artisan bread, cheese, meat, and seasonal vegetables.

events.name: Jazz at The Playhouse
events.description: An evening of smooth jazz featuring the Norwich Jazz Quartet. Drinks available from the bar.

events.name: Family Fun Day at The Forum
events.description: Free family activities including crafts, storytelling, and games. Perfect for children aged 3-10.

events.name: 80s vs 90s Club Night
events.description: Battle of the decades! Two floors of classic hits from the 80s and 90s. Fancy dress encouraged.

events.name: Open Mic Night
events.description: Showcase your talent or enjoy performances from local musicians, poets, and comedians. Sign up on the night.
